mapper.delete: DELETE FROM synthesis_cutting_tool_material_inventory WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
UPDATE synthesis_cutting_tool_material_inventory SET is_del = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:

synthesis_cutting_tool_code = #{synthesisCuttingToolCode},
synthesis_code = #{synthesisCode},
prepare_library_count = #{prepareLibraryCount},
for_grinding_count = #{forGrindingCount},
